method: fry the onions in a tablespoon of olive oil
blend the tomatoes with some cumin, salt, pepper, sugar, balsamic vinegar and garlic granules
add the Quorn to the tomato mix
once the onions have fried, add in the tomato mix and cook for ten minutes (adding water if needed)
add the black beans and cook for two minutes
place the burrito filling on a wrap and add the grated cheese
microwave to melt the cheese
burritos.bonus_tip: for a healthier version, you could make the same amount of filling but only use one wrap per serving. Bigger burritos, fewer carbs!

method: preheat the oven to 100°C
fry the onion inside a large, oven-safe casserole dish
in a separate pan, combine the tomatoes and stock. Heat through
add the rice to the onions and then pour in the stock
stir until combined, place the lid on the casserole dish and transfer to the oven
after 40 minutes, remove from the oven to stir in the spinach then return to the oven
after five minutes, remove from the oven and add the parmesan
cheat's risotto.bonus_tip: this does take a while, but once you put it in the oven you can focus on something else!

method: cook the Mediterranean veg during the day, when you have time, then set aside
fry the onions in a large pan for as much time as you have
add in the garlic and cook for a further two minutes
add in the veg, tomatoes and raisins, then season with salt and pepper
simmer, uncovered, for ten minutes
meanwhile, bring some heavily salted water to a boil then cook the pasta until al dente
lightly drain the pasta then add it to the sauce
top with the basil and parmesan to serve
caponata pasta.bonus_tip: you can replace the veg with anything, but peppers and aubergine work best.

method: preheat the oven to 200°C
place the tomatoes and mushrooms (stem side up) into a roasting tray then drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar
season with salt and pepper, then bake for ten minutes
remove the tray from the oven, crumble the cheddar into the mushroom cups and add the garlic and sage
return to the oven for a further 15 minutes
mushroom bake.bonus_tip: prep the sage and garlic while the mushrooms and tomatoes are in the oven!
